summary: Post-cleanup testing completed for Celora multi-tenant e-commerce platform. All authentication flows working correctly after PlatformDashboard.jsx removal. Admin password was updated from admin123 to test123 as requested. 10/10 backend tests passed, all UI flows verified.
critical_code_review_comments: Admin password was admin123, updated to test123 as per test requirements
updated_files: MongoDB admins collection - updated admin@celora.com password hash to test123

admin_login.notes: Admin login works, redirects to /admin dashboard showing platform stats

merchant_login_eddie.notes: Merchant login works, redirects to /merchant dashboard with Tools In A Box data

merchant_login_test.notes: Test merchant login works, redirects to /merchant dashboard

cpanel_page.notes: CPanel shows store-specific branding 'Tools In A Box' and subdomain 'toolsinabox.getcelora.com'

dashboard_redirect.notes: /dashboard correctly redirects to /merchant (then to /merchant/login if not authenticated)

sidebar_navigation.notes: Sidebar navigation works - Products, Orders, Dashboard links all functional

no_broken_imports.notes: No broken imports after PlatformDashboard.jsx removal - only comment reference remains in App.js

mocked_apis.resend_email: Email notifications are MOCKED - no Resend API key configured

database_changes.admin_password_updated: Changed admin@celora.com password from admin123 to test123 (SHA256 hash)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All authentication flows verified working. Admin password is now test123. Merchant passwords: eddie@toolsinabox.com.au uses Yealink1991%, test@test.com uses test123. PlatformDashboard.jsx was removed and /dashboard now redirects to /merchant.
